short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimal custom feeds in every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flash RSS Feed gives you a news from your RSS selection at every new tab. Using a minimal effective flashcard design, this extension allows you to use the dead time while you write in your search bar to show the latest updates from the world in the background. If you want to dig into the article shown more, explore it, with just one click. Subscribe to the rss feed you like and keep yourself up-to-date. As easy as that with Flash RSS Feed.
